attributes.action: Make wearing mask in public places like public transport or shops mandatory
attributes.additional_details: Many people uses their knowladge about masks from mems and fake news. They put at risk other lifes just because they believe in world conspiracy. They don't understand that masks are to prevent spread virus to others while they may not know if they have COVID-19. As we know, people can have this virus about 14 days without any symptoms but they can still spread it to others.
attributes.background: Make wearing face masks mandatory in all public places like shops, public transports and other closed spaces where people crowd in bigger numbers.

rejection.details:
It is already the law to wear a face covering on public transport and in shops, we're therefore not exactly sure what further action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/face-coverings-when-to-wear-one-and-how-to-make-your-own/face-coverings-when-to-wear-one-and-how-to-make-your-own
